Package simulator

Class Ant

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulator.Ant
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Traverser
    public class Ant
extends java.lang.Object
implements Traverser
    Class: Ant.java This class implements the Traverser interface. An Ant is associated to an object graph. It can move in his graph nodes. The ant stores its current node as the previous visited nodes.
    Author:
    Joao Lopes, Gon√ßalo Carvalho, Alessio Vacca

        public void placingPheroSetEvents​(int totalPathWeight,
                                  double time)
        This method is used by an object Ant to place pheromones in the graph.
        Parameters:
        totalPathWeight - is the weight of the path where the pherormones are going to be layed
        time - is the current simulation time

      • chooseProb

        public static int chooseProb​(java.util.List<java.lang.Double> probabilities)
        Static method used to choose randomly an element of a vector with a certain probability. It is used in this class in the method move() to choose the next node when an ant is moving
        Parameters:
        probabilities - is a vector of probabilities. His sum is one
        Returns:
        return the index of the element that was picked randomly

      • normProb

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Double> normProb​(java.util.List<java.lang.Double> probabilities)
        Static method that normalizes a vector of probabilities It is used in this class to compute the normalized probability of moving to a certain node in the move() method
        Parameters:
        probabilities - is the vector we want to normalize
        Returns:
        a normalized vector of probabilities

      • pherormoneInc

        public static float pherormoneInc​(int totalPathWeight)
        This static method computes the increment of pherormones when a Traverser is laying pheromones int the graph
        Parameters:
        totalPathWeight - is the weight of the path where the pheromones are being layed
        Returns:
        the level of pherormone increment

      • getCijk

        public static double getCijk​(Edge e)
        This static method is used to compute the non-normalized probabilities of a traverser moving through a given edge
        Parameters:
        e - is the edge where the traverser is going to move
        Returns:
        the non-normalized probability of that move
